DOC.brief_summary: To assess the effect of up to 4 years treatment with budesonide on progression of emphysema in patients with Chronic Obstructive Lung Disease.
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study of the Effect of Budesonide on Emphysema
DOC.criteria: Clinical Chronic Obstructive Pulmonary Disease diagnosis smoker No exacerbation within the last 30 days no long term use of oral corticosteroids
